@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:370591”]Im confused,
Are you trying to add a timer to a command or a method?[/quote]
I made a button on my quest tab for this, so when you click it it goes to the void.

case 28172: c.alchs(); break;

item.title: How to make a command only usable every 30 mins? (317, rep++,delta)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Hi again lol, im working on a command so that my players can get alching stuff but I want to make it so they can only get it once every 30 mins.

public void alchs() { sM("Some alching supplies magically appear in your inventory."); addItem(67, 100); addItem(561, 100); addItem(1387, 1); }
Before I tried to add a timer on it but it failed and got 99 errors (Not 100 for the missing bracket) So idk if I was doing it wrong. If anyone could help me and maybe explain the code a little bit for the timer I would love you and rep you

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a command only usable every 30 mins? (317, rep++,delta)
